TopicTitle: I Need Some Help For My Realistic KSP Save...

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I kinda need some help... I have to make the decision: Which country do I want to play as for my entire KSP career save. I will play as this country from the time when I kill my first vict- err, I mean "volunteer". Ya know, those guys you force into capsules while they are sleeping. Whatever. Anyways, I would like you all to leave answers in the poll above. Thanks!

-Acernian Space Program

Edited July 7, 2014 by Acemcbean

VOTING IS OVER! The winner of the poll is the United States, with 22 votes. In 2nd is Russia with 18 votes. In 3rd is Canada (Y Canada?) with 15 votes. All other countries received essentially negligible numbers of votes.

Edited July 9, 2014 by Acemcbean
I'm Canadian, but I opted for the American space program. Russia or Canadian would be good too.
I didn't managed to build an Eiffel Tower on MÃƒÂ¼n, but maybe you can do it (totally being realistic here). I'll go with France.

For any who haven't voted-

By this time marked by the timestamp above, Canada and the US are tied with 5 votes each.

Canada, because we need a polite space program.

EDIT: I HAD reserved this spot to announce the country that won, but then I figured out how to use the polls. Anyone mind telling me how to delete posts? Kthnxbai

Click on the edit post button in the bottom right corner, then click advanced, the delete button should be at the top.

Once more, to those who haven't voted-

As of now, the US is leading with 11 votes, with Russia close behind with 9
Apart from narrow racism is there any point to this 'playing as a country'?

Eh, not really. Its more of "hey, let me do the entire KSP tech tree while following as many potentially racist stereotypes as possible." No offense. Probably. (seriously though, not trying to racist.)

Didnt see Iran in there but was going to say hope it turns out better than this.

(PS the comments are brutal)

http://news.yahoo.com/blogs/the-sideshow/iran-unveils-unusually-colored-blue-submarine-211724188.html

Iran was a contender, but since I could only put 10 in the poll, they were knocked off because of a lack of doing stuff in space. France and Germany almost didn't make it as well, but they managed to squeeze in.
Are you going to be playing with RSS and using the correct launch sites? That would be cool. USSR/Russia because it's more challenging.

Normally for doing realism like this, I would do both those things. But there are two issues: I hate RSS (, and have no room left for it: I have like 30 some mods installed), and I am not using RSS to be able to do such a cool thing as that. I wish. (Screw RSS)
Right now, the US is leading with 16 votes, while Russia is in 2nd with 14, and Canada in 3rd with 10.

Btw, any particularly good mod suggestions (with a link pweeeeeeze) would be welcome. Some of my mods are a bit.... below par.

EDIT: Here is the list of the mods I'm running right now

  • Active Texture Management
  • BetterRoveMates
  • Chatterer
  • Custom Asteroids
  • Deadly Reentry
  • Kerbal Engineer Redux
  • FAR
  • Hullcam VDS
  • Raster Prop Monitor
  • KAS
  • KW Rocketry
  • Near Future
  • Final Frontier
  • Notepad
  • Procedural Fairings
  • Procedural Parts
  • RBI Tracks
  • Real Chute
  • Ship Manifest
  • Stockalike Surface Lights
  • Texture Replacer
  • TAC Life Support
  • That one jetpack thingy from Universal storage (Edited for TAC)
  • Interstellar
  • World Flags (Just the 11 countries [uSSR+Russia count as two as they have two flags] in poll)

And it all runs just fine, if you're wondering, on my crappy laptop (not a gaming one )

Edited July 8, 2014 by Acemcbean

FAR + DRE

Procedural Fairings

KAC

If you want moar graphics:

EVE

DOE

Russia (my vote) or China of course, as they have similar approach to safety as most KSP players. The USA or European countries wouldn't, for example, use nuclear propulsion for political reasons, whereas I don't think that would be a problem in Russia or China.

I don't think that would be a problem in Russia...

FOR MOTHER RUSSIA!

(Take a guess who I voted for)
Voting will officially end at 3:00 pm EST, Tomorrow. Again, that is Wednesday the 9th, or tomorrow. As well, Mother Russia has pulled ahead the US with 17 votes for Russia and 16 for the US
Playing as the UK is easy, just launch about 3 crappy rockets then declare it's a waste of money and wait for a florist to send someone into space instead.
See, that's why I nearly didn't put France on. Big country full of cheese and freeloaders is what I say.
Can't see the poll right now, but my vote is for Best Korea.

The available options are:

Canada

China

France

Germany

India

Israel

Japan

USSR+Modern Russia

United Kingdom

USA
Personally, I don't play as a country but a corporation instead.
Last time to vote! Voting will end at 3:00 pm EST today. Currently, it is 2:49 EST. Who is leading will be concealed for when voting ends.
